subject: Blacks
Colleges and Universities
Football
lead_paragraph: ¶A statue of the former Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis was reinstalled on campus, five months after it was removed to correct inaccuracies. The life-size statue depicts Davis in his Syracuse uniform holding a helmet under his left arm and a football in his right hand. The original unveiled in September, mistakenly showed Davis in Nike cleats and carrying a modern football and helmet. In 1961, Davis became the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy. He died of leukemia in 1963. davisStatue.
